title: Best of The Program | Guest: Christopher Rufo | 12/2/20
description:
A truck driver delivering ballots alleged possible fraud after a supervisor told him to change how he delivered a batch of mail, and another truck driver calls in to confirm how unusual the instructions were. Who in their right mind would want an $80,000 purse? City Journal contributing editor Christopher Rufo talks Biden’s promise to bring back critical race theory trainings.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
